name: The Tyrant's Dream
description:
The Tyrant’s Dream is a GM-less microgame about the power of prophecy.

Play as a Magus in a decadent court, and try to unravel the meaning of your ruler’s dreams. Will you be a true prophet, and grasp at the real meaning of the images in the dream? Or will you try and curry favor with the Tyrant, and become their Favourite?
